t: Ben Nye | Professional Makeup for Stage, SFX, and Beauty
s: November 14, 2024 - The company was founded by legendary Hollywood makeup artist, Ben Nye, Sr., in 1967, who used his extensive knowledge to create quality color cosmetics. The Ben Nye brand has broadened to encompass every genre of makeup including performance, beauty and special effects.
